resources.string:
1.This game is played individually. 
 2. To start game click on PLAY GAME button. 
 3. There are total 10 Questions with four answer choices. 
 4. Player can select one answer and conform message will appear. 
 5. If the answer is conformed and is correct then the price money will be reflected on the screen. 
 6.If not then the game will be over.
You have already confirmed answer. Now you cannot change answer. \nPlease click next for another question
You have confirmed correct answer, \nNow click next for another Question
You have confirmed wrong answer, \nNow click Next

Are you sure?

You cannot change answer once confirmed
You have exited game, You won\'t be able to claim your prize money.

Do not want to continue??

Click on prize money and claim it
